label: TH8320ZW
info_overview: Touchscreen Thermostat, precise comfort control, easy to use touch screen display, extra large backlit display.
info_inclusion: Press UP/DOWN arrows, select option 1 for inclusion.
info_exclusion: Press UP/DOWN arrows, select option 0 for exclusion.
